entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow early this morning. Snow beginning this morning then changing to periods of drizzle or snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
